intro: Psychotria kairoana, commonly known as the Kairoan Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes a wide variety of shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its simple, opposite leaves and small, clustered flowers that range in color from white to pale yellow. It typically grows in humid, shaded environments within the understory of tropical forests. Psychotria kairoana is noted for its ornamental value and is sometimes cultivated for its foliage and floral display.
